name: Fred Chalenor
description: '''Fred Chalenor''' (December 29, 1955 â€“ June 23, 2018) was an American bassist, most recognized for his work in the bands [[Caveman Shoestore]],  [[Tone Dogs]], and [[Face Ditch]]. He also collaborated on numerous occasions with composer and keyboardist [[Wayne Horvitz]], recording with him in Pigpen and Zony Mash, and with composer and percussionist Robert Mike Mahaffay of Tres Gone.
